abstract: The rising price of oil and of other commodities served as a tonic for the stock market, with energy and mining companies helping to lead the market upward.
snippet: The rising price of oil and of other commodities served as a tonic for the stock market, with energy and mining companies helping to lead the market upward.
lead_paragraph: Apparently convinced that the Federal Reserve will soon lower short-term interest rates, investors bid stocks higher last week.

headline.main: Energy and Mining Lead Stocks Higher
headline.print_headline: Energy and Mining Lead Stocks Higher
